desc: Lyrically Correct is a head to head trivia game to see who really remembers the lyrics to some of your favorite songs. If put on the spot, would you be able to answer a question about that one line from that hot song you loved back in the day?

layout.text: So You Think You Know Music?
Sure you can hold a note in karaoke, but when it comes down to it, do you really know the lyrics?
